page.title: 16Recreation:Peter Tavy Area
page.content: There are no facilities in the Peter Tavy area for sports so people have to travel to Launceston or Plymouth to find swimming pools and to Tavistock for other sporting facilities.There are three theatres and several cinemas in Plymouth which people in this area use for entertainment.The most popular family sport in Peter Tavy and around that area is swimming and many individuals enjoy this sport as well. Besides swimming many individuals like horse-riding.One unusual family hobby is writing and quite a few people like playing musical instruments;gardening and reading were also popular hobbies. Most people were satisfied living in the area but one person interviewed was dissatisfied as he thought there was not enough to do.
